title: Mulî (mountain)
description: Mulî is a mountain in Tabal. Inscriptions of the ninth-century-BC Assyrian king Shalmaneser III (r. 858-824 BC) refer to it as "the mountain of alabaster."

properties.description: Location based on OpenStreetMap node for Maden, which is near a Hittite rock inscription mentioning a Mount Muti (= Mulî?).
properties.title: Representative location of Mulî
